fields.name: GeoReplicatedPrimaryHostName
fields.description: The unchanging DNS name which will always point to current geo-primary cache among the linked redis caches for seamless Geo Failover experience.

fields.name: LinkedRedisCacheId
fields.description: Fully qualified resourceId of the linked redis cache.

fields.name: LinkedRedisCacheLocation
fields.description: Location of the linked redis cache.

fields.name: PrimaryHostName
fields.description: The changing DNS name that resolves to the current geo-primary cache among the linked redis caches before or after the Geo Failover.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Terminal state of the link between primary and secondary redis cache.
